StepData.Description: Welcome to The Island! This area will act as our habitat to help train your Chimeras.
You can explore the habitat by using WASD and zoom in and out with the scroll wheel.
We can start restoring the habitat and gathering resources by sending your Chimera out on an Expedition.
Let's click on the portal to get started!
We currently only have access to one Expedition, but don't worry I know we'll unlock more soon!
On the left side, you can add me to your Expedition Party. Up to 3 Chimeras can go on a single Expedition.
Amazing work! Thanks to your success, we restored our first Facility!
Facilities can be used to train individual stats to improve their success rate on Expeditions.
To train a Chimera, we will first need Essence.
This resource is gained by tapping on blue crystals that appear around the habitat as well as from Essence Expeditions.
Once you have enough, drag me over to the highlighted area in front of a facility to begin my training.
Looks like this next Expedition will give us some Fossils! As you prepare, pay attention to the recommended traits.
Using Chimeras with recommended traits will significantly increase the chance of success, so be sure to check what the Expedition is looking for!
Recommended traits include elements like Fire , Water , and Grass or stats like Exploration , Stamina , and Wisdom .
Looks like we found some Fossils and supplies to restore the Temple on our last Expedition.
Click on the Temple to see what Chimera you can restore with Fossils.
We've been able to restore part of the Stone Plains thanks to your hard work!
Now that the habitat has been upgraded, more crystals will appear and their Essence will be worth more.
Darn! It looks like your Chimera just failed its third Expedition in a row. Don't give up yet though!
Each Expedition has recommended stats and element types for participating Chimera. Matching these traits will improve your success chance.
Congratulations! You've restored the ancient Chimera Temple.
In front of you are some Chimera statues. Clicking on one will allow you to spend Fossils to summon a new Chimera!
Click the left and right arrows to explore the rest of the Temple!
When you unlock a Chimera for the first time, a figurine will be added to the Chimera Collection.
Clicking on a figurine will let you examine your Chimera in more detail.
In front of you are the Facility Upgrades. Clicking on an upgrade node (T1 / T2 / T3) will allow you to improve its associated Facility.
Doing so will let you train your Chimera faster and cheaper at that Facility!
